thread.section_title: Constant Contact Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Constant Contact | www.constantcontact.com
thread.title: Lars Edman
thread.title_full: Constant Contact reviewed by Lars Edman

author: Lars Edman
title: Lars Edman
text:
Overall I like Constant Contact, they offer a range of templates so I can try a new one out to freshen up my emails. The feedback is useful and the process is generally painless.
However one thing bugs me. The new interface when you login has no top menu, you are brought to the last bunch of emails and it can be frustrating to navigate to other areas because of this. I wish the top menu bar was returned so it was less of a choir to move around the site.
